main.name: Fahdil Ahady Hazain
main.description: Born to be Expert In Quality Engineering
main.bio: I am an experienced Software Engineer that has worked on multiple projects for some of the biggest clients. My expertise ranges from building test automation frameworks using Selenium and Python to writing complex API's in Jmeter or Postman, setting up CI/CD processes for development teams, and analyzing business requirements. I'm also well-versed with working on different data domains like electrical instrumentation and natural resource management. My main goal is to provide quality deliverables to our clients by leveraging the best tool for solving their problems
main.contactmessage: Do not hesitate to to reach me any time.

testimonials.text: To be an inventor, you have to be willing to live with a sense of uncertainty, to work in this darkness and grope towards an answer, to put up with anxiety about whether there is an answer
Technology is nothing. What’s important is that you have a faith in people, that they’re basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they’ll do wonderful things with them.
